body:
Hello everyone, I just wanted to apologize for the recent trolling on the forums. You all reacted to this situation correctly, and I thank you for that. All six of the trolls have been web banned.

Regards, -AV
body_tagged:
Hello everyone, I just wanted to apologize for the recent trolling on the forums. You all reacted to this situation correctly, and I thank you for that. All six of the trolls have been web banned.

Regards, -AV
title: Response to the Web Spamming

reply_to.body: You think you can stop us? We all have degrees in computer science, and are feisty for action. We are part of the 4chan hackers from OCN and what ever you throw at us we can by pass. Over  120 alts at our disposal, and we can get more as we please. We don't feel like commiting federal crime so your servers aren't going to get knocked down or anything, we're just having fun, and you can't do a thing.

replies.body:
It is a real shame they have decided to do this at such a special time of year , people put lots of hard word in to both OCN and Avicus and i would not like to see either community fighting over purely who came first;It's a poor excuse of a reason to ruin other peoples days , i'm sure these mods dealing with you would rather be enjoying their Christmas.

Merry Christmas everyone and thank you to the staff <3 Here to a happy 2015

replies.body:
Why do you make that assumption for pretty much everything?

Sometimes Ivy actually has other stuff to do, And sometimes it's not worth putting so much time into something so small.

replies.body:
I believe he said something along the lines that it's not necessary and it'd take too much time to code, and that it doesn't happen frequently enough to warrant prevention. Think of it like this; how would you block every site ever that has malware or porn? And how would it block gifs posted straight onto the site or stop tinyurl stuff?

Figure that out.

oh good for you, you got a degree that took 2 years + taking tests, studying, etc. just so you can troll people on the internet and ruin peoples day. replies.body:
I feel like I need to remind some of you that you shouldn't give these guys the attention they crave.

Don't respond to their posts and don't encourage their threats. Whether you have good intentions or not, by simply replying to these people, you are encouraging them.

Do not reply to these people.
Don't give them the attention they crave.
They WANT a reaction. Don't give it to them.

Ignore them.

This goes for the staff too.
